website_summaries.verdict: A nice little workhorse rice cooker that comes with a steamer basket for the veggies.
pros: Four cups dry rice will yield eight cups cooked food
Great size that is able to easily provide enough rice for a family meal
cons: This model only comes with one steamer mode, compared to some other Hamilton Beach models which have several cooking modes

customer_reviews.title: FLUFFY Basmati if you ignore the instruction booklet and follow this process
customer_reviews.text: First time I've ever been able to make fool proof fluffy Basmati rice! But not by following the instructions in the booklet! Here's what you do: 1) rinse the rice in water to remove starch (I swoosh rice + water it in a pot, drain, repeat, until water runs clear. Takes a while but worth it!) 2) soak the rice for twenty minutes to one hour 3) drain soaking water and add rice plus an equal amount of fresh water to cooker, and set it to go. So for example, one REAL cup Basmati plus one REAL cup of water makes perfect rice every time. Cute little rice cooker that is the perfect size for my small family.
customer_reviews.author: scout

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Used to have a similar one from Sanyo but they stop manufacturing it. This one is great, within 15 minutes the rice is ready, easy to clean. Not a single rice stick in the pot, really non stick, no wastage & cute! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Helena B

customer_reviews.title: Breaks fast
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about ten times before breaking. Doesn't stay in cooking mode. Within minutes it'll click back to warm mode and the rice is still submerged in water. I don't throw it around or abuse it. It's literally stayed on my counter and not moved. What a disappointment. It was awesome the ten times I used it but now it s just a waste of space. Thirty dollars is just not worth.
customer_reviews.author: C.Leong

customer_reviews.title: Rice made faster easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I love this I have been using it for the past few months. I can make rice and veg or Rice and seasons steamed fish ( small pieces) it cooks faster than the stove top. I come in from a morning run Put on my rice cooker veggies salmon. By the time I am dressed my Lunch is hot and ready to go. It cooks faster and unattended. Nonstick pot easier to clean ( The steaming bowl has gotten discolored by purple cabbage still so happy). Even a kid 10-year-old can use this with no worries of them burning down the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Why Did I Wait So Long?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rice; should have had this many years ago. One criticism: if left on "warm" too long, rice browns slightly. Should unplug it sooner rather than later. On the whole, very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.  A Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 batches and it burned the coating off of my stove top where i thought it would be safe since I have a wooden table and a teen kitchen with almost no counter space! Every batch was dried out and stuck together and the timer never pooped up! I threw it away, but I wish I could get my money back bc it was a disaster--Oh, and the bowl that holds the rice, kept slipping into the steaming water below...that was lovely to retrieve.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pizza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, compact unit
customer_reviews.text: It cooked 2 Cups of rice OK. Unit is nice, compact and lightweight. I was disappointed there were no timers to set for different types of rice, that take a little longer, as the unit sets its own time & temperature. It will never cook 4 cups of rice, I tried 3 cups and with the water required, the unit overflowed. Wish I had shopped more, I would have upgraded to more controls and a larger unit, but since I normally cook for just 2 people it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Diane98

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teen daughter soon to be moving to her own place. She knew how to cook two things: toast and eggs. Bought this and it’s so easy, a child can do it. Scoop of rice, two scoops water, broccoli in the top steamer bowl, close the lid and push one button. Did not want something complicated. She makes rice and broccoli daily now. So at least she can cook three things...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could only handle living for 5 months of light duty work.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased May 7, 2018 - Died October 30, 2018 Heating element decided to burnout, melt and warp (see picture) while cooking 2 cups of rice. Don't recommend anyone buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: SebastianCloud14

customer_reviews.title: Imperfect but Inexpensive Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker still works perfectly after being used every day for months. I like the fact that it only has one switch and still works correctly every time. It does not look or feel particularly high quality due to the design. Rice often sticks to the bottom and has to be scraped off leaving plenty of residue. The steam tray is a nice touch but for some reason mine always falls in (it should be larger). However, it makes rice very quickly with a good texture and taste every time.
customer_reviews.author: John Lobel

customer_reviews.title: Best rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is easy to use, makes great rice and is a good value. It's also easy to clean. I've purchased several rice cookers with digital features which seem to break right after the warranty expires. This one skips digital features and is simple to use and costs a lot less to get the same job done. And it makes better rice. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is a dream to use. I use brown rice. I rinse the rice in a strainer before putting it in the cooker. I usually add chicken broth to the rice instead of water, but I have used water as well. The cooker never messes it up. The rice turns out perfect every time! You can also steam veggies in the top of the cooker, if you want. I haven't done that yet, but it looks like that would be easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: First batch of rice came out scarcely cooked! Had to add another cup of water (total of nearly 2 cups of water for a half-cup of rice) and continue; then, it was still barely cooked. Tossed the rice. Also, I couldn't open the condensation cup to empty out the accumulated water. (Of course, there were no directions just how to open it; I had to check comments here to verify how to open it.) What a piece of junk! Thank goodness for Amazon's return policy. I'll keep shopping for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Porter

customer_reviews.title: Way better for rice than an Instapot!!! EASY TO CLEAN!
customer_reviews.text: When I broke my last rice cooker I replaced it with the Instapot because ..."I can do everything with that". I found myself never cooking rice because the Instapot is not nonstick and so rice is a witch to clean out of it. With this rice cooker you eat the rice (which comes out perfectly) and just do a quick swipe with a rag or sponge and violà. Perfect for a family.
customer_reviews.author: MmeP

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The rice cooker is not for 8 cups like its show in the box... I did not use it because I can only cook 1 cup ....
customer_reviews.author: Cristina C.

customer_reviews.title: Skip and invest in a good quality/trusted brand.
customer_reviews.text: I get to the con for this rice cooker. Plan to warm your rice, don't. It burn the bottom of the rice if left too long. With that top of the rice becomes dry also can and do get watery on the midde from sitting too long when unplug and close lid. Pro, well it cook the damn rice doesn't it. Best to invest in a good made rice cooker. Even if you only need to cook small portion, there several here you can buy that does keep the rice warm for several days without the burn, watery and dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Dinosaurdaddy

customer_reviews.title: you sort of have to fine tune the water to rice ratio to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. I’m a novice at cooking rice. This is my first rice cooker. I bought it to make sushi rice primarily. Not the easiest machine to use. I thought I could just set it and forget it. However, you sort of have to fine tune the water to rice ratio to get it right. So far, my results have been mixed. Overall, seems to be a good value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love this little cooker, perfect for 3 people at one sitting. This is the smallest rice I’ve bought. I owned bigger and more expensive ones in the past and always wasting rice. Was very skeptical before buying this cause it’s small and it’s cheap, but after using it, it’s great. One push button to cook and automatically goes to warming when cook. Small doesn’t take up slot of space. What’s great is the aroma and fluffiness of the rice is every bit worth buying. Taste soo much better then stove cook rice. So happy
customer_reviews.author: Peter Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Makes great rice but
customer_reviews.text: Makes great rice but I always unplug it versus leave it on warm when done. Tends to overcook on the bottom left on warm but if you unplug, it stays warm so problem solved. I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I love this rice maker. To be honest it's my first rice maker, so I have nothing to compare it to. However, it is far superior to making rice on the stove top. Just follow the directions and turn it on and you can leave it alone. Perfect rice every time. Also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: We Love It
customer_reviews.text: So far so Good! We've learned from using rice cookers for over 20 years to unplug it as soon as it is done, otherwise your rice will overcook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just loved it ..
customer_reviews.text: I used other rice cookers like aroma etc which is so difficult n irritating to clean the outer rim around the cooker under the lid but this model is so better .. easy to clean on tough areas ...loved it
customer_reviews.author: Suhasi

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in March of this year...it has burnt out already. I may have used it 10 times since purchase and smelt the burnt electric smell while trying to cook some rice on last and final use. I will try another model but stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: P. Spraker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, works great for any brown rice I ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, works great for any brown rice I can toss at it. Doesn't spit all over the place like other rice cookers I had.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyBear

customer_reviews.title: This does not cook the rice in the time stated ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not cook the rice in the time stated in the cookbook. It needs double the amount of time needed. It does not switch to warm when done. I’ve used it now multiple times to rule out operator error. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommended
customer_reviews.text: After disappointing purchase of Panasonic rice cooker, we decided to give this a try. It looks small but it cooks up to 4 cups dry rice, which is plenty for us. We usually only cook 2 cups. The rice came out amazing, and the price was great. Totally recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: S.Etank

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in May and it stopped working 2 weeks ago. The push down lever to start cooking keeps popping up. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: I cool

customer_reviews.title: The plastic insert doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: When you use the plastic insert to steam, when it gets hot, it becomes softer & can actually drop into the water. It needs to be made of harder plastic or a material that doesn't become pliable with heat. Other than that, it works. It's pretty basic, so if you are using it to make rice, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Cotter

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use it mostly for rice, rice a Roni, box soup mix, rice dishes. It works great. I love the fact that the lid latches on. I was constantly loosing the lid of my old rice pot.
customer_reviews.author: little Fuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Approved by dad
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my dad whose rice cooker bowl needed replacing (teflon coating was in poor shape). Arrived fast, this Hamilton Beach is small, yet cooks rice perfectly like the big boy it is replacing. Very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tennis4Ever

customer_reviews.title: It works well. It takes a little longer than ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well. It takes a little longer than my last one but it also holds more. It's very compact which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: thesavants08

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete and previously used
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this rice cooker show up without the steaming basket and the measuring cup, it's also obvious that the product had been previously used, as there were remnants of cooked rice in the pan and the instruction booklet was taped to the top of the box rather than inside the box. The product was not sold as a refurb, yet it clearly is. And even if it was, you'd think someone would bother to wipe out the inside first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overcooks rice and doesn't turn off automatically
customer_reviews.text: A crazy thing about this rice cooker is that it does not turn itself off when it switches from "cook" to "warm" so the rice keeps cooking and cooking and cooking. This happened before I realized the only way to get it to turn off is to UNPLUG it (says so right there in the manual). That's dumb and dangerous. Even after that, I tried another batch of brown jasmine rice and it boiled so hard that the rice still overcooked so that the bottom layer was dry and the rest cooked. This happened even though I unplugged the cooker when it switched from cook to warm. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Simple and works, when more then 2 cups it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple and works, when more then 2 cups it’s seems to boil over out of the vent and cause a mess though.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Menke

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: You can cook just about anything in here and I love it! Super easy to clean and the proportion labels are easy to follow! Just turn on and walk away!
customer_reviews.author: Sydknee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly perfect rice maker
customer_reviews.text: I’m realizing - to my own fault - that brown rice needs a half cup more water than white varieties in a rice cooker (not just this one) otherwise you will be stuck with the flop of burnt rice at the bottom of the cooker. Yes this cooker makes fabulous rice. Read the water to rice ratio!!
customer_reviews.author: ANNIE WILLCOX

customer_reviews.title: Will use this a lot!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this steamer recently and already know we're going to use it a lot!! Makes perfect Rice in about 25 minutes, and keeps it warm. I did rinse mt rice very well before cooking, and it was super fluffy. Also have steamed veggies and dumplings, and they came out great... The steamer basket is pretty small, so it would be perfect for a student for dorm cooking.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaMama

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Took this out of the box, washed and prepared to make rice. Loaded it up and turned it on. About 5 minutes later it clicked over to warm. If you in plug it and plug back in it'll work for another 5 minutes. Will not cook rice. Very disappointed in Hamilton Beach. May never buy another of their products.
customer_reviews.author: hotnakedbigfoot

customer_reviews.title: Great Rice Cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this purchase! It's so easy to use and works perfectly every time. I use it for meal prep and so far have made rice & broccoli in it. I'm excited to see what else I can make using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great but measure markings are hard to read
customer_reviews.text: The container for cooking the rice, the measuring marks are hard to see because the inside color is black and the measure markings are also black. Otherwise it cooks ok
customer_reviews.author: MARCIAH

customer_reviews.title: Efficient design. Great for smaller families who eat at different times!
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for my boyfriend and me while still having space for more rice incase we have a guest or two. Super easy to clean and dishwasher safe. Rice tastes great and the steamer/strainer is very convenient to rinse the rice before cooking! I love that once it's done cooking it automatically switches to keeping the rice warm and stays like that until you unplug it. My boyfriend works late so we often eat at different times but this keeps the rice warm until he gets home. Overall very pleased with my purchase and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Curran

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a rice cooker where I would put my rice, add some water and press one and only one button to start cooking my rice. Well I found it with this rice cooker. I am very happy with it. So, if you're on the market for something like what I described, this cooker is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Great Rice Cooker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful, among the best rice cookers I have used. It cooked quick and to perfection and it came with everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon Hague

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Works great aside from the small thing that the rice in the center, at the bottom, will often be a bit overdone. If left on warm for the day, you'll have a ring of rice at the bottom that you prob don't want to eat; it'll be a little hard.
customer_reviews.author: fitmami

customer_reviews.title: Month out still working well
customer_reviews.text: Hope I'm not jinxing myself by saying it, but we've been using this rice cooker quite a bit over the last month and it's held up. The rice never comes out too dry or wet, and the basket for rinsing comes in quite handy. I do wish it had a bell like the old school rice cookers (think my mom's that was dinged up from 20+ years of use, but somehow survived, with a bell!) . Still, it had seemed sturdy thus far. Knock on wood.
customer_reviews.author: Blake M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: The directions make each and every rice perfect
customer_reviews.text: Not being a rice person but knowing how important brown rice is to remain healthy at 72 this is the perfect rice cooker easy to follow the directions and each and every time the rice is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Arlene N

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Rice is a staple food in Puerto Rican culture but usually I'm in a rush and cooking can be very time consuming. So far I've only tried to make white rice and it comes out really nice and fluffy. I found that x-amount of long grain rice, adding the same amount of water plus an additional half gives you the perfect balance. Add a little bit of salt and a little bit of oil (this is the Puerto Rican way, don't hate) and done! Will try to update review as I try to make other things with this rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Kelimar

customer_reviews.title: Get it - worth it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!!!! Easy to you. I suck at cooking and this is perfect even if you leave rice in for too long, the non-stick is great cuz it doesnt cake on or anything. Ive never aaactuallu burned anything. Just got the bottom rice a little brown. Theres no buzzer or anything. But 10/10 fo sho
customer_reviews.author: vbr

customer_reviews.title: Back to Stove Top
customer_reviews.text: I tried. I really did. When my 7th batch of rice came out gross, dry and sticky I threw the thing in the trash. Maybe this one was defective. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Traci B

customer_reviews.title: Handy little appliance
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how much rice this little cooker could prepare in one batch. Very handy appliance.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a nightmare! The only reason I bought it was to save time but the time I actually save using it I end up using it to clean the spills from this machine every time! I tried changing the ratio but still it doesn't want to work properly. I end up having to let the lid open which makes it take longer. Not the mention that it's really hard to clean!! It started to stink after a month of using it. I'm so disappointed honestly I really wanted it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Aramouni

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The rice cooking use of this device is just fine but the steamer probably would take some getting used to as it would need to be carefully timed to prevent overcooking. Definitely a well built cooker and does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Ted M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No appliance has ever filled me with as much rage as this one.
customer_reviews.text: My rice came out dry and crunchy every single time. I tried adjusting the water to no avail. It’s possible I received a defective unit, so I’m returning it, but not asking for a replacement. I felt like I was losing my mind trying to get it to work. Cooking rice on the stove is easier than using this abomination.
customer_reviews.author: Peter1205

customer_reviews.title: Best quarantine purchase we've made!
customer_reviews.text: This little fella is amazing! We've never enjoyed such perfect rice and the clean up is a breeze!!! Easy to use A++
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: it sucks after a while
customer_reviews.text: It starts off ok like any other rice cooker, but after using it for a little less than a year, it seems like it's developed a little problem. It has a hard time handling water while the rice is cooking, and bubbles of water become little streams that flow down the rice cooker. I guess you really do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Yu

customer_reviews.title: An ok rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the same one we have had for years. The only reason we bought a new one was we were scratching off the Teflon. I wish they could find a way to make them without that.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Inkley

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice and both times it worked great. Some of the best tasting rice I've had in a while. Very small, which is nice. Cooks 8 cups which is plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Dalance

customer_reviews.title: Messy. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I've used rice cookers for years. This just makes a big mess. I know how much water to use and even if you make a half batch, water comes out of steam vent and runs all over. Would never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling

customer_reviews.title: The best little rice pot you'll ever want!
customer_reviews.text: I can't cook rice for the life of me in a regular pot. After I bought this little gem, the rice is perfect every time. Bamati, Jasmine, all great every time. Such a great little helper, I bought two just in case the first one ever breaks. No worries, though. Built great!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Love this rice cooker it works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Love this rice cooker it works great so far. I have used it three times and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly easy to clean and use. Cooks rice perfectly, price considered. I love the rice rinse basket/veggie steamer!
customer_reviews.author: LID0409

customer_reviews.title: Great little Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Works great and quickly. Remember to soak the rice first to avoid bottom scorching. The steaming basket included works well. Comes with a cup of exact measurement of water to rice.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Farsace

customer_reviews.title: Love my Hamilton Beach Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love my new rice cooker. It is the perfect size for us. It came with a rice spoon and steam basket. I recommend buying this if you’re looking for a mid size rice cooker. Mahalo, Maile
customer_reviews.author: Maile

customer_reviews.title: Great small rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cook rice and amazingly that's what it does. Makes great rice and even comes with a basket to steam vegetables while cooking your rice. Perfect size for a small family. Easy to clean also.
customer_reviews.author: Nephi Bahr

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty basic only has one button. Depending on what type of rice you are cooking water measurements vary. I am extremely satisfied for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Makes rice perfect every time. Super easy to use and clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Ovalle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rice for Two
customer_reviews.text: Love this RICE COOKER. It made very fluffy rice and the size fits to feed 2 people. A little left over if small eaters.
customer_reviews.author: norma

customer_reviews.title: The product description is misleading. It does not cook ...
customer_reviews.text: The product description is misleading. It does not cook 3 cups accurately and 3 cups will make the lid pop open. It’s just too little for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: RKDigital

customer_reviews.title: Cook fast
customer_reviews.text: It’s just the right size for office.. cute n works Good..
customer_reviews.author: Nine69FourZero tai

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect size for two people as we rarely make more than 2 cups at a time. Since the kitchen is white and grey, this cooker fits in well. It is very easy to clean and I never have to scrub. I will be buying this again if this one breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: fast and easy rice
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a rice cooker before so this is my first experience but so far it has done a pretty good job. have burnt the bottom of the rice a few times so just need to add a dab more water maybe
customer_reviews.author: katrina jensen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this machine, it is small but that's what I was after, perfectly suits my needs. Easy to use, easy to clean, easy to store
customer_reviews.author: JMKG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Has directions on how to use and what you can cook in it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lowe

customer_reviews.title: This product died after 4 uses. Cannot get any product support from Hamilton Beach
customer_reviews.text: After only 4 uses, the product no longer works. I cannot get any help/support from Hamilton Beach because of the virus. The rice on the bottom always comes out glued together and almost burned. I like using a rice cooker but because I cannot get any support, I will shop for another brand. And, I must have received a defective item. And, I cannot return!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: Does worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use and clean, and also very affordable. I wish it had an off switch so you were not obliged to unplug it! However, it is not perfect for more than 3 small cups and might make the rice (depending on the rice quality) like dough.
customer_reviews.author: Behnam K.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RICE COOKER
customer_reviews.text: Love this rice cooker. Purchased it because I was watching alot of travel videos for Japan. Great for steaming veggies at the same time or separately.
customer_reviews.author: Houdinii

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rice pot! It’s easy to use extremely easy to clean, and cooks rice perfectly as well. We eat some form of rice just about everyday I like that I put everything in and I can do other things ha while this handles the rice and veggies. Quick and easy to clean as well!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it hundreds of times now and it still makes perfect rice every time. As long as you unplug it once it’s finished the rice just slides out easy, leaving a practically empty rice pot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. I feel like I need to pour less water than what’s indicated, but it’s easy to use, compact any great for people who don’t cook a large portion in one time.
customer_reviews.author: SO

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rice cooker. It has held up well over the past year of use. The only reason that I gave it 4 stars instead of five is because the bottom burns easy to make crunchy rice if you leave it on for too long. Not too much of an issue but can be inconvenient if you want to leave for a while.
customer_reviews.author: kennah rogers

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my small cooker. Now we have enough oatmeal in one pot.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: An easy and quick way to make rice
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an easier way to make white rice as it has become a staple food for me. This product is an easy way to make a big batch of perfectly done rice. The included steamer basket works great for rinsing the rice before cooking.
customer_reviews.author: James W Van Fosson

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: FAN-TAB-ULOUS! Received it this afternoon & cooked up some stir fry. Rice & steamed vegetables came out perfect in about 17 mins! Added some steak strips & dinner was done! GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: jakemagscinni

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is a jewel! Works great, cleans up great, rice turns out perfect every time. Can't get a better price either!

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Better than my previous old rice cooker.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, and he LOVES it! Has used it probably two dozen times in the last month, and has yet to burn the rice, something he used to do pretty much every time on the stove

customer_reviews.text: This cooker is just the right size for my family whether there are 2 of us or 7 of us having dinner.

customer_reviews.title: Just right for a couple
customer_reviews.text: My Filipino wife eats rice every day. Being just the two of us, this small rice cooker is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Grear value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first rice cooker, and I was pleasantly surprised by this little one. It cooks fast, the only issue I have is that the metal top cover is not so easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is wonderful. It is so easy to figure out the water/ uncooked grain ratio.

customer_reviews.title: Tiny steam plastic attachment could get lost easily.
customer_reviews.text: The only negative revision the water steam small plastic attachment which had to be cleaned and dried. It could get easily damaged or lost. Then, you can’t usd the rice cooker anymore. Other than that it works well.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for Couple or Individual!
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a cheap cooker. It’s good quality and very easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melba Yates

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy N.

customer_reviews.title: Short term rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: We loved this rice cooker and it worked well for about a year. Then, it started to smell like rotten food and I realized that food had accumulated underneath the lid which is an area that is impossible to clean. So, this thing went to the trash and we upgraded to an instant pot. We would still be using this, however, if it was easier to clean. The design of the product is made so it doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Riccio

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I had to cook longer than the directions said. But ti worked well. Easy to set up & easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ChEssMom

customer_reviews.title: The basket that you steam things in.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot of steamers but this one is by far the worst one I have ever owned. The basket seems to always fall down inside of the hot boiling water. It should of had a better design. I now have to buy another one because I am tired of messing with this unit.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love my my rice cooker. Stylish and beautifully made

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Tool. Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen tool! Slow cooker, steamer, rice cooker. Also great for making beans, canned beans have so much salt.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Woman

customer_reviews.title: It ok
customer_reviews.text: This is an alright small rice cooker. The main complaint I would have is that it overflows onto the counter. This seems to happen no matter how much water is in it. Other than that, it is good for a cup or 2 of rice.
customer_reviews.author: Tuck

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Mini Rice Cooker & Food Steamer, 8 Cups Cooked (4 Uncooked), With Steam & Rinse Basket, White (37508)
product_meta.description: Making rice and whole grains in the Hamilton Beach Small Electric Rice Cooker & Food Steamer is as easy as placing the ingredients in the bowl and turning it on. The rice will cook perfectly on its own, giving you time to prepare the rest of your meal. There's no need to worry about boiling water, adjusting the temperature or even setting a timer - it will automatically shift to warm once the cook cycle is complete. With a 2-8 cup cooked rice capacity, you can cook a small side dish or enough for the whole family.
feature_bullets: 2-in-1 Rice Rinser/Steam Basket:Rice Cooker and Food Steamer Includes a Versatile Steam Basket That Lets You Rinse Rice Before Cooking and Steam Food to Perfection.
Feed a Crowd: Rice Cooker Holds 2–8 Cups of Cooked Rice or 1–4 Cups of Uncooked Rice.
Simple, One-Touch Operation: 8-Cup Rice Cooker Automatically Cooks Rice Then Switches to Keep Warm After Cooking for Perfect Rice Every Time.
Easy Cleanup: Removable Nonstick Cooking Pot and Rice Rinser/Steam Basket Are Dishwasher Safe. the Lid Liner Can Also Be Removed for Easy Cleaning.
Accessories Included: Rice Cooker Includes Measuring Cup and Rice Paddle. Cooking Pot
